text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow You know what, known of them have 4,000 lawsuits against them! None of them have an active Rape case against them! None of them have ignored our Intelligence Agencies warning about the Coronavirus! And let’s not forget #BountyGate! You are all doomed. https://t.co/8htACAP11f
